name: V60
tagline: James Hoffman's recommended technique for making coffee with the Hario V60, and any other cone-shaped brewer with a large open area.

steps.description: Wet the grounds using twice the coffee weight in water
Swirl vigorously, making sure to wet all the grounds
Let the grounds bloom until the 30 second mark
Pour in 60% of water over the next 30 seconds
Pour in the remainder of the water over the next 30 seconds
Stir once clockwise and once counterclockwise
Swirl once clockwise and once counterclockwise once it's safe to do so
